rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space that leads to the central courtyard and other living areas.

rooms.name: Living/Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-plan area with floor-to-ceiling windows, merging the living and dining spaces. This space opens up to the central courtyard for natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area with floor-to-ceiling windows, designed with modern fixtures and seamless flow into the dining space. Integrated storage and workspaces are included.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A small bedroom for guests featuring a built-in closet and comfortable seating area. Vastu considerations ensure the placement is auspicious, ideally in the northeast corner.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The main bedroom with ample space for storage and a personal balcony. Vastu principles guide its placement to ensure positive energy flow, typically in the southwest.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Shared bathroom facilities designed with efficient plumbing and sufficient natural light. The location is chosen according to local building norms and Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large door leading from the entrance hall into the central courtyard. Features a modern glass design with secure locking mechanisms.

openings.name: Window Openings in Living Area
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows installed along one side of the living/dining area, providing abundant natural light and ventilation. Vastu ensures alignment with positive energy flow.

openings.name: Kitchen Windows
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows in the kitchen area for ample light during cooking, maintaining an open feel and connection to the living space.

rooms.name: Studio Loft
rooms.description: A split-level studio area that functions as a secondary living space or home office. The design maintains colonial aesthetics while incorporating modern conveniences.

rooms.name: Storage/Laundry
rooms.description: A compact utility room for laundry and storage, designed with efficient space utilization and adherence to local building codes.

openings.name: Loft Access Stairs
openings.description: Staircase connecting the ground floor to the studio loft. Designed for accessibility and in line with local safety regulations.
